item.description:
Venez vous rechauffer les mains avec une tasse de café (ou du thé) et discuter avec nous!

It will be an "annual meeting" of sorts -- a chance to take care of group business. So bring your DUES as well as comments, suggestions, and wishes for what our group can do for you in the coming year.

Cafe on the Corner is on the west side of Central Avenue/Route 108, just south of the railroad tracks. It's on your right if you are driving south from Spaulding Exit 9; if you are driving north from a prior exit, you will have to turn left on or make a U-turn at the traffic light at Third Street.

Park in front of the Cafe on Central Avenue, around the corner on Third Street, or in a free municipal lot off of Third Street (next to the bank, across from the Strand cinema). Come on in and look for the Meetup sign on the table . . . or just listen for us! We try to claim a spot in the back of the main room, where the couches are, but seating is first come, first served.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language January Meetup #2
